span.span: Represents a perspective projection camera.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 指定的投影[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_3d](~/includes/tlasharptla-3d-md.md)]模型到[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_2d](~/includes/tlasharptla-2d-md.md)]可视化图面。 specifies a projection of a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_3d](~/includes/tlasharptla-3d-md.md)] model to a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_2d](~/includes/tlasharptla-2d-md.md)] visual surface. 此投影包括透视收缩。This projection includes perspective foreshortening. 换而言之，描述边集中点的平截体。In other words, the describes a frustrum whose sides converge toward a point on the horizon. 对象靠近相机出现更大，而较远的位置照相机对象出现较小。Objects closer to the camera appear larger, and objects farther from the camera appear smaller. 下图显示正交投影和透视缩短相机投影之间的差异。The following diagram shows the difference between orthographic and perspective-foreshortened camera projections. ![正射透视投影](~/add/media/camera-projections4.png "射透视投影")![Orthographic and perspective projection](~/add/media/camera-projections4.png "Orthographic and perspective projection") ## Examples [!code-xaml[3dgallery_snip#ApplyDrawingToMaterialExampleWholePage](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/3DGallery_snip/CS/ApplyDrawingToMaterialExample.xaml#applydrawingtomaterialexamplewholepage)]
